field.name: nocache
field.label: Disable Joomla Cache for com_content
field.description: WARNING: If you set this to no, many plugins like ImageScale won't work anymore because Joomla! does not call plugins with cached content.

field.name: is_auto_groups
field.label: Auto Groups Assignment
field.description: If a verification succeeds (manual user verification or plugins like paypal, passthrough, etc.), the users will be automatically added to the Joomla! groups selected below. Please activate this only if you made sure the settings below are correct, as this will add the desired groups for EVERY verified user. If you are not sure, limit to the desired views below.

field.name: auto_groups
field.label: Select user groups
field.description: If auto groups is above is enabled, any user will be added to the groups selected if a verification succeeds. If the verification is not valid no longer, the groups will be automatically removed from the users.

field.name: auto_groups_limit_views
field.label: Limit Groups on Views
field.description: Add a comma separated list of view IDs to operate auto groups on these views. If left blank, the groups will be assigned across all users that are verified for at least one of your views.
